channel.title: When i compile
channel.description: Can somone help me compile my server it doesnt let me it say my jdk isnot updated i dled the newest one too?

item.title: When i compile
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

Set your compiler to the correct path.

To find the correct path

Use this method;

Start > My computer > Local Disc C: > Program files > Java

In there you will see all of your Java files, The one that says JDK is the path you set it too, For example Mine is jdk1.6.0_11

Read full topic

item.title: When i compile
item.dc:creator: @myspaceman123 myspaceman123
item.description:
@myspaceman123 wrote:

really wow i didnt know that i have always just used that one

Read full topic

item.title: When i compile
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“myspaceman123, post:2, topic:269474”]use this compiler

right click your compiler and hit edit copy and paste this

@echo off title WATEVER HERE compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/quote]
Use that one. It’s the ‘perfect’ compiler.

Read full topic
